definition: stage/proscenium/foreground in politics etc (sometimes derog.)/front desk/reception desk/(computing) front-end/foreground
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: The front-of-house didn't think too much of it, especially the staff from overseas.
sentences.chinese: 前台都没什么感觉，特别是那些外籍员工。

sentences.english: The receptionist books the room for the arriving guest.
sentences.chinese: 前台接待员为来客预订房间。

sentences.english: Unfortunately the photo is a bit dark, so cannot see the reception clearly.
sentences.chinese: 很不幸像片拍得有些暗，所以看不清前台。

sentences.english: Please make sure you drop your library card at the front desk before you leave.
sentences.chinese: 请确保在离开时，把图书卡放在前台。

sentences.english: The phone system communicates the update to the front-desk information system.
sentences.chinese: 电话系统将更新的信息传送给前台信息系统。

sentences.english: Others think the prime minister is pushing him forward to take the opprobrium.
sentences.chinese: 另外一些人则认为，总理正在把他推到前台承受口水。

sentences.english: I in Wuning, Jangxi. My job is Receptionist.
sentences.chinese: 我在江西武宁，我的工作是前台。

sentences.english: In the foreground the rubber hose and metal nozzle can be seen.
sentences.chinese: 在前台的橡胶管和金属喷嘴可以看出。

sentences.english: Banks want to deliver front-office services that provide a "360-degree view" of the customer.
sentences.chinese: 银行希望前台能提供客户的“360度观察”。

sentences.english: At checkout time a hotel guest will ask the front desk to prepare the final bill for payment.
sentences.chinese: 结帐时，客人会要前台准备付款结算单。

sentences.english: The front-desk personnel asks the guest for a driver's license and form of payment.
sentences.chinese: 前台服务员请顾客出示驾照并询问其付款方式。

sentences.english: Jiefang J6 is pushing China logistic industry to the world.
sentences.chinese: 解放J6正推动中国物流产业走向世界前台。

sentences.english: Proscenium , whom do play in backstage?
Some appeared on the stage, while others pulled strings behind the scenes.
sentences.chinese: 有人在前台表演，有人在幕后指挥。

sentences.english: The human affairs of the company and downstage, simpatico to the person.
sentences.chinese: 公司的人事和前台，都对人和蔼可亲。

sentences.english: All Transportation Vouchers must reach the Front Desk clerks prior to the guests' departure.
sentences.chinese: 所有的用车单必须在客人退房前送到前台接待处入帐。

definition: variant of 櫃檯|柜台[gui4 tai2]
sales counter/front desk/bar/(of markets, medicines etc) OTC (over-the-counter)
variant of 櫃檯|柜台[gui4 tai2]
to pay the bill/to settle accounts/also written 結帳|结帐
Taiqian county in Puyang 濮陽|濮阳[Pu2 yang2], Henan
(at a restaurant) to order a meal/(of a waiter) to take an order
compartment (of train, ship etc)/private room at restaurant/rented room for karaoke/hotel room rented by the hour
